Call of Juarez Gunslinger (c) Ubisoft

     05/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
           1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action


From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, Call of Juarez
Gunslinger is a real homage to the Wild West tales. Live the epic and
violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West s
most notorious outlaws. Blurring the lines between man and myth, this
adventure made of memorable encounters unveils the untold truth behind
some of the greatest legends of the Old West.


1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
  your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

if anyone have error 0xc0000142. Here is wats worked forme. You have to use steam_api.dll and steam_rld.ini(!) from another game (i used from dead island riptide, from metro last light works too). Then you have to copy AppId number from steam_api.ini included in this release and paste it in proper place in steam_rld.ini (otherwise game works but only as demo). You can change language as usually. For problem with shadows quality change, use reg fix Okyra posted. Game runs for me with no problem. Hope it helped. Cheers

You're right.  Alot of the people complaining about their slow speeds are falling victim to their own client or client settings.  Rather than ever trying to experiment and fix it..they find it more useful to post comments telling people to "seed moar", not even understanding fully the differences between a seed and a peer.  Thx for the info (it's not spam I checked).

People having errors related to any file containing the letters DX....This is Direct X.  If it's missing a file called "d3dx9...", then you're missing Direct X 9.0c.  Windows 7 ships with DX11, not with DX9..but you can and should still install DX9 since not all games will support DX11.  Hop on the google and look for dxwebsetup.exe from microsoft, this will install 9.0c and all the updates to it.

Is there i way to get rid of the fucking annoying black bars!?
Screens, trailer and requirements : http://checkrequirements.com/game/call-of-juarez-gunslinger-pc

TO EVERYONE HAVING PROBLEMS WITH LOW FPS RATE. 

Here's a fix that brought me from 10-15 fps up to around 60. It's not your hardware, its a bug that Ubisoft is trying to patch. Until then, try this.

1. Enter the Ease of access center which can be accessed through Accessories after clicking Start.
2.Once, you are there, click ‘Make the Keyboard Easier to use’.
3. Click ‘Turn on Repeat Keys and Slow Keys’,and then on ‘Set up Repeat Keys and Slow Keys’.
4. Select the “ignore all repeated keys” option and reduce the time to 0.0 mentioned in the box. 
5. Make sure that ‘Turn on Filter Keys’ is ticked at the top of the panel.
6.Apply the changes and see if the stutter goes away with it.

Hope this helps. This fix made the game so much more enjoyable for me.
